newsitem.title: FRANCE: Timing of Franco-German news conference uncertain.
newsitem.headline: Timing of Franco-German news conference uncertain.

text.p: Officials could not say whether the delayed start to a France-German economic summit on Wednesday would mean the postponement of a joint news conference scheduled for 1145 GMT.
The talks started in Lyon one hour behind schedule after German Finance Minister Theo Waigel's plane landed at the wrong airport.

Waigel was holding talks with French Finance Minister Jean Arthuis, and French and German central bank heads Jean-Claude Trichet and Hans Tietmeyer. The talks started shortly after 1000 GMT instead of 0905 GMT as scheduled.
